mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.

  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10

  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
